existing_features.title: Publish/deploy the app to a brand-new Internet Computer canister (do not reuse any previous deployment) and provide the user with the new working public URL to share (must be different from https://caffeine.supply/d/3).
Verify the new deployment supports SPA routing and deep links for both routes "/" and "/celebrate" (including direct navigation and browser refresh) following the checks in frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md.

projectName: Republish and provide a fresh working shareable link
